SEARCH
Package it.astromark.chat.service

Interface HomeworkChatService

All Known Implementing Classes:
HomeworkChatServiceImpl
public interface HomeworkChatService
Service interface for managing homework chat-related operations. Provides methods for retrieving, sending messages, and managing homework chats.

  • Method Details

    • getChatWithMessagesSocket

      HomeworkChatResponse getChatWithMessagesSocket(@NotNull @NotNull UUID chatId)
      Retrieves a homework chat along with its messages using a socket connection.
      Parameters:
      chatId - the UUID of the chat
      Returns:
      a `HomeworkChatResponse` object containing the chat details and messages Pre-condition: The `chatId` must not be null. The chat associated with the `chatId` must exist. Post-condition: Returns the chat details along with its messages.

    • sendMessage

      UUID sendMessage(@NotNull @NotNull UUID chatId, @NotEmpty @NotEmpty String text)
      Sends a message to a specific homework chat.
      Parameters:
      chatId - the UUID of the chat
      text - the message text to be sent
      Returns:
      the UUID of the sent message Pre-condition: The `chatId` and `text` must not be null or empty. The chat associated with the `chatId` must exist. Post-condition: The message is sent and its UUID is returned.

    • findTeacher

      Teacher findTeacher(@NotNull @NotNull UUID chatId)
      Finds the teacher associated with a specific chat.
      Parameters:
      chatId - the UUID of the chat
      Returns:
      the `Teacher` object associated with the chat Pre-condition: The `chatId` must not be null. The chat associated with the `chatId` must exist and have a teacher assigned. Post-condition: Returns the teacher associated with the chat.

    • addChat

      void addChat(@NotNull @NotNull Integer homeworkId)
      Adds a new chat for a specific homework.
      Parameters:
      homeworkId - the ID of the homework Pre-condition: The `homeworkId` must not be null. The homework associated with the `homeworkId` must exist. Post-condition: A new chat is created and associated with the specified homework.

    • getMessageList

      List<MessageResponse> getMessageList(@NotNull @NotNull UUID chatId)
      Retrieves the list of messages from a specific chat.
      Parameters:
      chatId - the UUID of the chat
      Returns:
      a list of `MessageResponse` objects representing the messages Pre-condition: The `chatId` must not be null. The chat associated with the `chatId` must exist. Post-condition: Returns the list of messages for the specified chat.

    • hasUncompletedHomeworkChat

      UUID hasUncompletedHomeworkChat(@NotNull @NotNull Integer homeworkId)
      Checks if there is an uncompleted homework chat for a specific homework.
      Parameters:
      homeworkId - the ID of the homework
      Returns:
      the UUID of the uncompleted homework chat, or null if none exists Pre-condition: The `homeworkId` must not be null. The homework associated with the `homeworkId` must exist. Post-condition: Returns the UUID of the uncompleted homework chat if one exists, otherwise null.

    • getStudentHomeworkChatId

      UUID getStudentHomeworkChatId(@NotNull @NotNull Integer homeworkId, @NotNull @NotNull UUID studentId)
      Retrieves the chat ID for a specific student's homework chat.
      Parameters:
      homeworkId - the ID of the homework
      studentId - the UUID of the student
      Returns:
      the UUID of the student's homework chat Pre-condition: The `homeworkId` and `studentId` must not be null. The caller must have permission to access the specified student's homework chat. Post-condition: Returns the UUID of the homework chat associated with the specified student and homework, or throws an exception if not found.

    • isCompleted

      boolean isCompleted(@NotNull @NotNull UUID chatId)
      Checks if the specific homework chat has been marked as completed.
      Parameters:
      chatId - the UUID of the chat
      Returns:
      `true` if the chat is completed, `false` otherwise Pre-condition: The `chatId` must not be null. The chat associated with the `chatId` must exist. Post-condition: Returns the completion status of the chat.

    • complete

      boolean complete(@NotNull @NotNull UUID chatId)
      Marks a specific homework chat as completed.
      Parameters:
      chatId - the UUID of the chat
      Returns:
      `true` if the chat was successfully marked as completed, `false` otherwise Pre-condition: The `chatId` must not be null. The chat associated with the `chatId` must exist. Post-condition: Marks the chat as completed and saves the update.
